version_description: Fixed a memory leak that could cause crashes when syncing lots of sounds and images to the device.
Fixed a memory leak that could cause crashes when syncing lots of sounds and images to the device.

* AnkiMobile now requires iOS7 or later.
* Display at native resolution on the iPad Pro.
* Support iOS9 split-screen multitasking.
* Support shortcuts to Add and Search from the app icon on iPhone 6S.
* Sync button now changes to yellow if changes are waiting in AnkiMobile or on
the server.
* Almost all deck options can now be configured within the app.
* New "check media" option in the preferences which behaves like the computer
version.
* Collection options ("Next day starts at", "New/review order" and "Learn
ahead minutes") configurable within the app.
* Stats icon has been removed from the decks list, but is still accessible
via Tools screen, or an assigned swipe, tap, or quickbar action.
* Importing and exporting improvements:
- Collections over 2GB/64k files are now supported.
- Much faster importing and importing of collections.
- Shows progress as the operation proceeds.
* Audio handling simplified:
- When playing automatically, don't make the background music quieter, and
don't play if the mute switch is on.
- When replaying audio via the (re)play button, the volume of existing music
is dipped and the mute switch is ignored.
* Scratchpad improvements:
- Cleaner design that appears under the bottom bar.
- Clear button now clears one stroke at a time, or hold to clear everything.
- Now changes line width on devices that support pressure feedback (iPhone
6S, iPad Pro+Pencil)
- Support higher resolution strokes on devices that support it.
* Bluetooth keyboard now supports 1-4, space and r during review, and tab to
move between fields when editing.
* You can now add an empty deck from the Add/Import button on the deck list,
as well as the existing way via the Add screen.
* Note editor improvements: next/previous field buttons now include the tag
field, and deck/note type selectors now appear on a single line.
* Most screens updated to support iOS9's readable margins on large devices
like the iPad Pro.
* Up to 12 tool buttons and 8 quickbar buttons now.
* Remember tags when adding.
* Backups can now be managed via the preferences screen.
* Long press on a deck to rename it.
* Add screen automatically reveals keyboard.
* Searching now shows the card template name.
* Check DB removes unused tags.
* Add "bury card" option.
* Fix audio not replaying if it had an apostrophe in it.
* Deck stats now count buried cards.
* Fixed the wrong hint field sometimes being revealed.
* Rotate log file when it grows too large.
* Custom study screen updated, and now previews number of cards in a search.
* "Show bottom bar" renamed, and no longer hides card counts.
* Status bar now hides/shows with the navigation bar.
* deck:name searches are now case insensitive.
* Fix the study screen occasionally getting stuck when returning from
editing.
* Fix AnkiMobile sometimes crashing when returning to the deck list.
* Fixed an issue that prevented deletion of media files with non-Latin
filenames from syncing properly.
* Fix cases where the wrong remaining counts were shown.
* Fix taps sometimes not working on bottom row of tool buttons.
* The next card to appear after an undone card will now always
be the card you were looking at prior to the undo.
* Fixed searching/filtered decks that searched for a property that was zero, eg
prop:reps=0.
* Fixed a bug where preview during a search could preview the wrong sibling.
* Importing will now update media files if sizes don't match.
* Warn when LaTeX image missing.
* Fix crash when "$" entered into type answer area.
* Fixed crashing caused by style tags in fields.
* Fixed an issue with reporting review count in statistics screen.
* Fixed a bug in renaming profiles that had certain characters in them.
* Fixed a bug that could cause newly added cards to go to the wrong deck.
* Miscellaneous other fixes.

- Other minor fixes.
